resources.string: But cant find your dream job beacause of the freshers tag?
Join Pre-Corporate School at Kooky Infomedia
Remove the freshers tag by being experienced of working with the professionals

To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Inde sermone vario illa a Dipylo stadia confecimus. Habes, inquam, Cato, formam eorum, de quibus loquor, philosophorum. Roges enim Aristonem, bonane ei videantur haec: vacuitas doloris, divitiae, valitudo; Quae contraria sunt his, malane? Potius ergo illa dicantur: turpe esse, viri non esse debilitari dolore, frangi, succumbere. Sumenda potius quam expetenda.
